name: AI_SetCondition_OnConditionsChangeDelayed
documentation: Sets the given condition of the given player after the given time and the given other condition changed to true. TODO after what? after it changed as delay?

parameters.name: EverActive
numberHint: Resets the condition back to false when read.

parameters.name: ObservedConditionValue
parameters.documentation: The target value the observed condition must switch to to active this condition.
